pages.text: A wand core can be attuned to a particular spell by focusing ones sorcerous energies on it while holding an appropriate catalyst item. This will consume both the core and the catalyst item, leaving the sorcerer with a wand attuned to a particular spell. This cannot be undone.

pages.recipe: Use the wand core with an appropriate catalyst item in your offhand. The catalyst item for a given spell can be found within the entry for the spell within this book.
